column4: I'm trying to umount /home  but it says the filesystem is busy
anyone know how to see what is using /home?   I've tried fuser  but it shows nothing
I tried that. it shows nothing
if it resits, it's probly with good reason
what's it say on the attempt?
sorted it out.  turns out that it was NFS that was locking it down.  it doesn't show up because nfs runs in the kernel
I found a hint from google :)
